text: The Commonwealth War Graves Commission (CWGC) is a British international organisation taking care of cemeteries and memorials of the British Army across countries of the Commonwealth of Nations. The organisation was established in 1917, as an idea of the British Army to take care of and maintain the military cemeteries. == Other websites == * CWGC official website * Maple Leaf Legacy Project * South Africa War Graves Project * United Kingdom National Inventory of War Memorials * New Zealand Memorials Register, Ministry of Culture & Heritage Category:1917 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Commonwealth War Graves Commission
